attributes.long-description:
Raise and care for a family of dogs – for the first time on the PSP® system! Adopt a pet dog from a variety of breeds, and create unique breeds, such as Labradoodles, then customize your pet's look with tons of outfits and accessories. Watch them grow and develop their own unique personalities as you become the proud parent of generations of dogs.

Adopt your favorite dog from a wide variety:
• Choose your pet from popular, well-known breeds.

Raise your own family of dogz:
• Breed and cross-breed your own unique pets.
• Nurture your dogz from baby to adult as you watch them grow.
• Influence personalities by the way you raise your petz.

Watch your dog play with other dogz:
• Let your dogz play together and watch them interact.
• Or set up play dates with your friends wirelessly and exchange dogz!

Get rewarded as you play through the game:
• Unlock new toys and environments so your petz can play with you or against each other.
• Unlock fun outfits and accessories and customize your dogz looks.

High-quality game with realistic graphics:
• Taking advantage of the PSP® system’s technology, the dogz look as realistic as ever with new fur technology, motions and environments.

attributes.name: Petz® Dogz® Family
